author: dekarxp
title: Very good.
review: Will it's a great little set.Comes with 2 weapons.Comes with the mask of toa metru vakama.Body is a foot.Has no eye's.In my oponion it has little bit of poseabilty.Will it's pretty good but it's tooooo little.But i'll get him if you want to MOC on it.4/5 for my rating a must have!

author: Gus_263
title: Ta Matoran of Voya Nui
review: This set is an matoran, that have 22 usable pieces. Like all the matoran of 2006 Balta is playable, but the legs unfortunately are no much and are small. Balta is different from the other matorans no only in colors, mask and weapons, all the matoran of 2006 are different one to others. Balta features some pieces with different colors to the original red, colors like silver, gray and orange. This set includes also the huna mask and two air katanas. Overall, Balta is good builted and playable for a matoran. I rate so, 5/5

author: DarthVader_
title: Cool Matoran.
review: This is one of my favorite matoran!  I like everything!  Except for his arms.  Te can basicly just go up and down.  I mean, they could of itleast made it gofoward and backwards.  Besides that, it is a good set!

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Matoran) - Balta Review
review:
This is a fun little set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This figure has some cool parts: We get two swords, two nice looking feet and another mask which we've seen on Toa Metru Vakama. All pieces are great for future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms for sure.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we don't have to worry about stickers as well.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8725-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands, the legs, the feet and the head can be moved. I really like the design of this figure - even if this doesn't have a lot of play features. As I told you in the beginning: This is a fun little set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
